name: Arcane
info: When hit by spells, your damage taken is reduced by 25%

name: Armored
info: When hit by basic attacks, your damage taken is reduced by 25%

name: Berserk
info: For every percent of health lost, Damage Taken -1%, Strength +1% (Caps at 30)

name: Crimson Rush
info: When under 40% HP, your agility is boosted by 50% for 10 rounds

name: Divine Shield
info: When hit by an enemy, absorb the damage and stun the target for 5 rounds, lowering their defense by 0.25x

name: Echo of the Past
info: Reflect damage back to the target for 10%

name: Execution
info: 10% chance to execute the target [Execution: deal 3x damage]

name: God's Blessing
info: Heals 10% of your Max HP and improves Healing Effect by 25% for 6 rounds

name: Justice
info: A hit that causes death resurrects the player for 50% of the HP

name: Poison Edge
info: 10% chance to inflict poison to the target for 5 turns

name: Premonition
info: If target is at 100% HP, deal 500% more damage

name: Rock Skin
info: While stunned, your damage taken is reduced by 30%

name: Second Wind
info: When your HP falls below 50%, Defense stat is boosted by 100%

name: Zeus Wrath
info: 15% chance to unleash a storm of thunderbolts (10) dealing 50% of your damage each
